sentences.en: An artificial language has no vitality.
sentences.cn: 人为的语言缺乏生命力.

sentences.en: And now Lin's business was beginning to show some vitality.
sentences.cn: 而他的生意呢,眼前分明有一线生机.

sentences.en: Broadway audiences and critics were struck by its originality, vitality, and excitement.
sentences.cn: 它是那样地别开生面, 生气勃勃, 激动人心,百老汇的观众和评论家无不为之倾倒.

sentences.en: Despite her eighty years, Elsie was full of vitality.
sentences.cn: 尽管已80岁了，埃尔茜依然充满活力。

sentences.en: He came back from his holiday bursting with vitality and good health.
sentences.cn: 他度假归来之后,身强体壮,充满活力.

sentences.en: He is an ambitious young man full of enthusiasm and vitality.
sentences.cn: 他是个充满热情与活力的有远大抱负的青年.

sentences.en: He was quite tireless, bubbling over with vitality.
sentences.cn: 他毫无倦意，兴致勃勃地说个没完。

sentences.en: It is hoped that the factory will add to the economic vitality of the region.
sentences.cn: 该工厂有望增强该地区的经济活力.

sentences.en: Onscreen, she lacks the vitality or charisma to pass this performance off.
sentences.cn: 电影中的她缺乏演绎这出戏的活力和魅力。

sentences.en: She is bursting with vitality and new ideas.
sentences.cn: 她朝气蓬勃，满脑子新主意。

sentences.en: Small touches to a room such as flowers can be what gives a house its vitality.
sentences.cn: 房间里放些诸如鲜花之类的小点缀可以给家里带来生气。

sentences.en: The military exploit had roused a surge of national vitality.
sentences.cn: 军队的成就在全国激起了一片蓬勃朝气.

sentences.en: These burst upon the London scene with an explosive vitality.
sentences.cn: 这些以崭新的活力闯入伦敦文坛.

sentences.en: These writings burst upon the London literary scene with an explosive vitality.
sentences.cn: 这些篇章以崭新的活力闯入伦敦文坛.

sentences.en: This experience of heightened vitality and potency fills me with joy.
sentences.cn: 这种提高生命力和潜能的体验使我充满了欢乐.

sentences.en: Used together these colours will make your interiors glow with warmth and vitality.
sentences.cn: 这些颜色搭配使用会使你屋子里暖意融融，充满生机。

words.tran_cn: 至关重要的；生死攸关的；有活力的
极其；紧要地；生死攸关地
[生物] 活力论；[生物] 生机说
赋予…生命；激发；使有生气

trans.tran_cn: 活力，生气，生命力，持久性
trans.tran_en: great energy and eagerness to do things
